Name: Up In The Air
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist (discarded) and float (dehydrated) apple slice or wedge on rim.
Review: Sweet and sour with apple, almond and zesty lemon fortified with vodka.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2011 at the Chapel Bar in Berlin , Germany.
Nutrition: One serving of Up In The Air contains 164 calories
